ygData.subject: Re: wis items
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL, PBB s are NOT fairly common drops.  I have hunted the evil eyes in beholder quite a lot and still have yet to get one.   They are rare drops, but at level
ygData.messageBody:
LOL, PBB's are NOT fairly common drops. I have hunted the evil eyes in beholder quite a lot and still have yet to get one. They are rare drops, but at level 29 they are a fairly easy camp and you still get some bit of xp so it's not that awful. The biggest problem is that , at least on my server, they are usually camped.

Eachann Bronzeleaf,
Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: Chrisstauf k <chrisstauf@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, December 10, 1999 2:22 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] wis items


> From: "Chrisstauf k" <chrisstauf@...>
>
> You can get the Polished Bone Bracers from the eyes in the gorge..they are
> +3wis +???..can't quite remember what the other + is. They are a fairly
> common drops..although I tried for about 3 days and didn't get a one..then I
> got 2 of them in like an hour.
>
>
> >From: "Sianne ." <maggee1@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] wis items
> >Date: Fri, 10 Dec 1999 18:01:23 GMT
> >
> >i have a savant cap and a silvered ruby veil, i forgot about that... what
> >kind of rings have the +3 wis ? and are there bracelets with +wis. I hate
> >to be a pain, but my time is so limited i don't have a lot of time to look
> >things up on the net...how much does the plat ruby veil go for.... where
> >do
> >you guyz find that the best place to purchase things are...no one seems to
> >be selling anything i need in Unrest...
> >
> >
> >>From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
> >>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] wis items
> >>Date: Fri, 10 Dec 1999 17:02:37 GMT
> >>
> >>At your level, you should be able to afford +6 wis rings, +3 wis
> >>earrings (maybe you meant these, not sure I've heard of +2 wis
> >>earrings). While in Unrest, you can probably score a savant's cap
> >>from the reclusive ghoul magic (+3wis/+3int). You've already got the
> >>BS tunic, so after you get the cap, head to Runnyeye, and help
> >>someone camp for the crown, and try to get a BI medallion. It's a
> >>fairly common drop in this area (+3wis/+3int). Next up, you could
> >>probably afford a silver ruby veil (+4wis/+4str) for around 250pp, or
> >>if you're rich enough, go for the platinum ruby veil. (+7 wis).
> >>
> >>I'm 22nd and I have:
> >>2 +3wis earrings
> >>2 +6wis rings
> >>testament of vanear
> >>lizarscale mantle
> >>savant's cap
> >>BI medallion
> >>
> >>My wisdom is 152. (118 base)
> >>
> >>
> >>>From: "Sianne ." <maggee1@...>
> >>>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >>>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >>>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Blackened Iron
> >>>Date: Fri, 10 Dec 1999 16:25:26 GMT
> >>>
> >>>I tell ya, i am in Unrest now and pretty bored there..i am getting Exp
> >>>slowly..but everythin is blue...anyway...i need the BI medallion for
> >>>wisdom..i am really hurting for wisdom and i just can't seem to spend the
> >>>time it takes to do those quests and to camp for hours on end. I need
> >>>stuff!! LOL right now i have an observer staff, BS Tunic, +2 wis
> >>>earrings
> >>>&
> >>>some +wis rings ( 2 or 3 not sure) anyway..i need a runed circlet and a
> >>>bi
> >>>medallion....but i wanted some of the other black armor just for looks
> >>>till
> >>>i get better..cuz i look really stupid right now..i have on a bs tunic,
> >>>bronze arms and banded greaves and shoes, LOL...i look like i got dressed
> >>>in
> >>>the dark... *sigh*
> >>>
> >>>Sianne
> >>>29th Cleric
> >>>Xegony
> >>>
> >>>
